description.narrative: Albanian society upholds democratic values allowing citizens equal opportunities to make informed choices and hold public institutions accountable.

Den föreslagna insatsen innebär ett stöd till BIRN Albania för implementering av deras halvtidsstrategi för 2018-2020. BIRN Albaniens huvuduppdrag är att upprätthålla demokratiska värderingar, vilket tillåter albanska medborgare att erhålla lika möjligheter till medvetna val och lika möjligheter att ställa regeringen till svars.

The contribution is core support to BIRN Albania for implementing the mid-term strategy 2018-2020. The main objective of BIRN's work in Albania is "Albanian society uphold democratic values allowing citiznes equal opportunities to make informed choices and hold the goverment accountable".

tag.narrative: 16.10 - 0 Säkerställa allmän tillgång till information och skydda grundläggande friheter, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning och internationella avtal.
16.10 - Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: BIRN Albania has been supported by Sida with core funds for the implementation of the strategy and core programme for the period 2018-2020, which was organized around three outcomes: - People have increased access to accurate information. - People have increased influence on democratic processes. - Internal organization's capacities are improved. BIRN Albania have worked toward increasing people’s access to accurate information by producing and publishing thousands of articles on important socio-economic issues; reaching thousands of republications in local and international media outlets; strengthening the knowledge and capacities of local journalists by providing reporting grants to local journalists from all the regions of the country and supporting them through on-the-job training and mentoring; making the voices and underreported and vulnerable groups heard; developing innovative training curriculums for journalists and journalism students; providing an enabling environment for investigative journalism - free from political interference and economic interests, through the online publication reporter.al; and producing advocacy campaigns and reports on media freedom and freedom of expression in the country. BIRN Albania have contributed toward people’s increased influence on democratic process by monitoring the transparency of local and central institutions; publishing dozens of investigations on cases of corruptions, abuse of power and impunity from public institutions; making available for public use thousands of documents collected through FOI requests; developing open access databases on public spending initiatives; analyzing asset declarations of judges, prosecutors and elected officials; monitoring the implementation of Judiciary Reform; scrutinizing finances of political parties; and increasing the collaboration with CSOs and activists by providing them a platform to raise their visibility and strengthen their participation in decision-making processes. BIRN Albania have improved the internal capacities of the organization in implementing a human rights based perspective by updating all internal administrative and financial procedures; developing new internal procedures and guidelines; raising capacities of the staff through on-the-job and formal trainings; increasing exchange and collaboration with other local and international media organizations; and increasing human and financial resources of the organization.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
